org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie

Class ReadOnlyBookie

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.BookieThread
        • org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.BookieCriticalThread
          • org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.Bookie
            • org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.ReadOnlyBookie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public class ReadOnlyBookie
extends Bookie
    Implements a read only bookie. ReadOnlyBookie is force started as readonly, and will not change to writable.
